alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Ozark; Texas; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 9:41AM CST until February 16 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Missouri, including the following counties, in south central Missouri, Texas. In southwest Missouri, Christian, Douglas, Ozark, Webster and Wright. * WHEN...Until 930 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Some low-water crossings may become impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 940 AM CST, Trained weather spotters reported that low water crossings are becoming flooded due to heavy rainfall overnight. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mountain Grove, Ava, Houston, Licking, Seymour, Mansfield, Norwood, Hartville, Dawson, Duncan, Huggins, Plato, Odin, Brushyknob, Manes, Graff, Bendavis, Squires, Dogwood, Goodhope, Success, Rome, Roby, Bucyrus, Elkhead, Keltner, Hazelton, Prescott and Garrison. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Christian; Douglas; Ozark; Texas; Webster; Wright
